original:
In 2023, Quebec City hosted the Rencontre des entrepreneurs francophones, an international meeting that brought together business leaders and economic organizations from over 30 countries. This event aimed to foster collaboration and networking among French-speaking economic stakeholders.

Since the early 20th century, various financial and economic networks have been established to unite key players in the French-speaking economy, incl
